caller_intent: The caller (Gary) attempted to pay a premium but encountered a discrepancy between the proposal amount ($29,185.30) and the system's displayed payoff amount ($3,080.85) for his home auto and umbrella policies. He seeks clarification on which amount is accurate.
resolution_steps: Agent (Wayne Mickey) acknowledges the discrepancy and asks for clarification on which policy (home auto/umbrella) the caller referenced.
Agent notes the conflicting amounts and states they will verify the details by checking the system.
Agent offers to call back within 10 minutes after confirming the correct payoff amount.
knowledge_required: Understanding how to access and verify policy details in the agency's system
Handling premium payment discrepancies between proposals and system records
summary: Gary contacted the agent about a discrepancy between the proposed and system-recorded premium amounts for his home auto and umbrella policies. The agent will investigate the discrepancy and call back within 10 minutes to resolve the issue.
